sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react'; export default function CreateNewElement({ tab, onCreate }) { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({}); return ( <>
Create New {tab.slice(0, -1)}
{e.preventDefault(); onCreate(formData);}} className="flex flex-col gap-4"> { tab === "Payments" && ( <>
setFormData({...formData, payer: e.target.value})} />
setFormData({...formData, amountDue: e.target.value})} />
setFormData({...formData, amountPaid: e.target.value})} /> setFormData({...formData, datePaid: e.target.value})} /> )}
) }
